abstract: Nestle says it has found way to restructure sugar so it tastes just as sweet in smaller amounts; is pursuing patents for process and says products made with restructured sugar should be on market in 2018.

headline.print_headline: New Reformulated Sugar Will Allow a Lower Amount in Candy, Nestlé Says
headline.main: Nestlé Reformulates Sugar and Says It Will Use Less in Its Candy

snippet: The new product is sugar, but is made differently so less goes into the stomach but consumers still get the sweet taste....
lead_paragraph: The new product is sugar, but is made differently so less goes into the stomach but consumers still get the sweet taste.
